roles.title: Senior Technology Consultant
bullets: Architect and deploy enterprise AI solutions leveraging Azure AI, OpenAI, and knowledge graphs to automate complex government and healthcare workflows.
Lead cross-functional teams in the delivery of data-driven platforms, translating stakeholder requirements into scalable ML pipelines and dashboards.
Design and implement prompt engineering frameworks that improve LLM accuracy and reduce hallucination rates in production environments.
Build and maintain Power BI and Tableau reporting ecosystems, enabling real-time operational visibility for federal agency clients.
Conduct model validation, bias assessments, and performance benchmarking to ensure regulatory compliance across AI deployments.
Collaborate with clients to define data governance strategies and establish standards for responsible AI use.
Mentor junior consultants on ML best practices, Python development, and Azure cloud infrastructure.

roles.title: Analyst, Regulatory & Compliance Affairs
bullets: Supported FDA 510(k) and CE Mark submissions by compiling and reviewing technical documentation for Class I and II medical devices.
Developed SQL-based tracking systems to monitor regulatory submission timelines and flag compliance gaps.
Collaborated with R&D and quality teams to interpret and apply ISO 13485 and FDA 21 CFR Part 820 standards.
Analyzed clinical trial data to identify adverse events and support post-market surveillance reporting.
Created process documentation and SOPs to standardize regulatory workflows across departments.

roles.title: Data Analyst, R&D
bullets: Built predictive models using Python and machine learning to forecast product performance and consumer sentiment from clinical and survey data.
Designed interactive Tableau dashboards that consolidated R&D KPIs, reducing manual reporting effort by over 40%.
Performed statistical analysis and A/B testing on formulation variants to guide product development decisions.
Integrated disparate data sources across clinical, consumer, and supply chain domains into unified analytical pipelines.
Presented data-driven findings to senior R&D leadership to inform ingredient sourcing and product launch strategies.
